spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Ashdra has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Ashdra to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Ashdra has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.
